mapper.sql: id, car_id, user_name, phone, car_type, effective_time, money, begin_time, end_time, disable, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag
mapper.select:
select
from mht_oeg.sys_car where remarks >= ( select MAX(remarks) from sys_car )
mapper.insert: insert into mht_oeg.sys_car (id, car_id, user_name, phone, car_type, effective_time, money, begin_time, end_time, disable, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{effectiveTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{money,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{disable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update:
update mht_oeg.sys_car
car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_type = #{carType,jdbcType=CHAR},

update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
